title.rendered: What to Do Before Selling Your Junk Car

content.rendered:
It happens to the best of us. You’ve found yourself with a junk car in Chicago. Whether your vehicle no longer runs, or the damages are just too expensive to fix, it’s time to cut your losses and get rid of it. However, it’s easier said than done. Given the hassles involved in selling your car, you may not know where to begin. Thankfully, Aero Auto Parts has your back.

Remove Your Belongings

Don’t leave anything behind! Make sure you get everything out of your car before bringing it to the junkyard. Similar to houses, cars tend to accumulate things over time. If you’re anything like us, you probably don’t even remember all of the items you’ve been storing in there.

Have Your Title in Order

Above all else, the single most important item to have ready before the sale is your vehicle’s title. To transfer ownership to the junkyard, you must have a valid title to the care.

Remove the License Plates

Don’t forget to remove the license plates before your car is towed away. In fact, in many states, you can’t cancel your registration without returning your license plates to the department of motor vehicles.

Don’t Waste Your Gas

If your car is still in working condition, try to use up the last of your gas before handing it over. In some cases, the value of gasoline in your tank can represent a sizable portion of the price you’re getting for your junk car in Chicago.

Contact Aero Auto Parts today for more information on junk car prices! We offer same day pickup and cash on the spot, whether it’s running or not.
